duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and evaluate board and cable designs for system modules and components of multi-functional systems.
Develop electronic systems including low level motion controllers, sensor interfaces, data acquisition, and system test bed utilities for electro-mechanical systems.
Design circuit boards and sub-systems using CAD/CAE tools; plan and conduct tests to verify theoretical analysis; perform empirical analysis and interpret experimental data.

Document and communicate designs, specifications and project status; fabricate breadboards and prototypes; develop test plans, test specifications and design verification experiments; and participate on multi-functional development teams.

Communicate and provide input for project status and project schedule updates; document efforts via established procedures using CAD systems; transfer technical documentation into revision control system including creating and assembling Document Change Orders (DCOs).
Establish electrical engineering specifications; troubleshoot/analyze problems; make recommendations; work well with others and coordinate efforts with own and other departments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor´s degree in Electrical Engineering (Master's preferred)
